title: Maintenance
subtitle: "Take your self, you'll be okay."
description: Maintenance is a psychological survival horror game. Though in the vein of classics such as Silent Hill, Kuon, Rule of Rose, and Eternal Darkness, it strives to carve its own path using contemporary themes as inspiration for its narrative.

Game Development: Creating a flexible fixed camera system.
Narrative Design: Designing and implementing narrative-driven systems and mechanics.
Visual Design: Character design, modelling, texturing, and animation.
